+
+#![feature(pub_restricted, type_macros)]
+
+mod foo {
+    type T = ();
+    struct S1(pub(foo) (), pub(T), pub(crate) (), pub(((), T)));
+    struct S2(pub((foo)) ()); //~ ERROR expected one of `+` or `,`, found `(`
+                              //~| ERROR expected one of `+`, `;`, or `where`, found `(`
+}
